Users can delete automations in their or.name: Users can delete automations in their org
Users can delete automations in their or.using:
(organization_id IN ( SELECT member."organizationId"
   FROM member
  WHERE (member."userId" = auth.uid())))

prebuilds_cli_requires_path.value: ((user_id IS NOT NULL) AND (local_path_hash IS NOT NULL)) OR ((user_id IS NULL) AND (local_path_hash IS NULL))
